name: The Test (Larius Games)
description:
I found a CD-ROM in the attic upon checking its contents i found an exe called "THE TEST".

I decided to put the exe on the internet to show you the content.

Have fun!

CONTROLS:

W A S D - Move

Spacebar - Jump

E - Interact

R-Restart last checkpoint

SOCIAL

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LariusGames

Discord: https://discord.gg/MUkKvg2Q
